resources.string: Unfinished game found. Would you like to continue?
This is a challenging solitaire game. You need to build 4 foundations - each must contain all cards of one suit (2 copies of each card from King down to Ace).
- Place a King on an empty foundation
- Continue with cards of the same suit in descending order: Queen, Jack, 10... 2, Ace
- After Ace, place another King, then Queen, Jack... until you collect all 26 cards of the suit
- Place cards of the same suit in ascending order on the waste pile, starting with Ace
- Only an Ace can be placed on an empty waste pile
- Place cards of the same suit in ascending order on external wells
- Only cards from the adjacent internal well can be placed on an empty external well
- Tap the stock to deal cards (initially 5 cards are dealt)
- When the stock is empty, all cards are collected back
- Each subsequent deal shows one card less (4, then 3, etc.)
You win: when all 4 foundations are complete (26 cards each)
Game over: when no more moves are possible but cards remain in the wells
